content.html: A lot of community trust was broken yesterday by the CNCF’s Twitter account. I hope the staff steps up & works to repair that. A Code of Conduct should *never* be used to protect a company from public criticism. 1/n
content.value:
A lot of community trust was broken yesterday by the CNCF’s Twitter account.

I hope the staff steps up & works to repair that.

A Code of Conduct should *never* be used to protect a company from public criticism.

1/n
